retrieved_answers.question: What is the definition of Yoga? What is Yoga?
retrieved_answers.answer: Endowed with wisdom and evenness of mind, one casts off in this life both good and evil deeds; therefore, devote yourself to Yoga; Yoga is skill in action.

retrieved_answers.question: What kind of person can attain Yoga?
retrieved_answers.answer: I think Yoga is hard to be attained by one with an uncontrolled self, but the self-controlled and striving one can attain it by the appropriate means.

retrieved_answers.question: How did the knowledge of Yoga get lost?
retrieved_answers.answer: This, handed down in regular succession by the royal sages, was known. This Yoga, however, has been lost here over time, O Parantapa (burner of the foes).

retrieved_answers.question: What is the path in time followed by those who attain Yoga?
retrieved_answers.answer: Fire, light, daytime, the bright fortnight, the six months of the northern path of the sun (the northern solstice) departing, then men who know Brahman go to Brahman.

retrieved_answers.question: what happens when the mind is controlled by the practice of Yoga?
retrieved_answers.answer: When the mind, restrained by the practice of yoga, attains quietude, and when one sees the Self by the Self, they are satisfied in their own Self.
